54.1.hd_quote: The ability to achieve influence through secret relationships, anywhere from the private adviser to the Satanist.
54.1.behavioral_axis: Ambition aimed at helping someone else rise, so you rise with them.

54.2.hd_quote: Don't let them see how ambitious you really are.
54.2.behavioral_axis: Signals reliability by keeping ambitions and alliances out of public view.
54.2.shadow_axis: Leaks intentions → allies stop trusting the channel.

54.3.hd_quote: The ability, when stymied in formal relationships, to use secret or purely informal channels when it is the only resort.
54.3.behavioral_axis: If the ladder is blocked, it finds side doors and informal patrons.
54.3.shadow_axis: Shady networks → reputation risk, relationships broken.

54.4.hd_quote: Do for the totality what you hope the totality will do for you.
54.4.behavioral_axis: Uses ambition in service of the whole → personal elevation arrives indirectly.
54.4.shadow_axis: Self-focused ‘enlightenment’ quest that bypasses the tribe.

54.5.hd_quote: The natural authority and actualizing spirit, that in a position of power can have genuine and fruitful relationships with the less advantaged.
54.5.behavioral_axis: Appears generous; actually moving up through empowering others.
54.5.shadow_axis: If unrecognized → withholds support; ambition stalls.

54.6.hd_quote: The energy to restrict relationships that hinder ambition.
54.6.behavioral_axis: Only fuels relationships that can reach the 45/queen level.
54.6.shadow_axis: Writes people off too quickly → isolation at the top.
